The spreadsheet has been created with American English date formatting (MM/DD/YYYY).

**Summary:**
- 78 usability test records extracted
- Dates converted from Portuguese (ago, jul, jun, mai, abr, mar, fev, jan) to MM/DD/YYYY format
- Data spans January 2024 to August 2025
- Columns: ID, Test Type (Host/Guest), Date, Link 1-4

You can open this directly in Excel or Google Sheets. The links in the spreadsheet will be clickable.
